issue.title: Add support for pre gazebo-1.0.x model XML in parsing URDF's Gazebo Extensions

content.raw:
actually, this was already done in the [gazebo-1.0 based fuerte branch](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/13ac178834e050883f647b5dfb1e4ea926d1db76/?at=fuerte) and [this gazebo-1.2 based branch used for groovy release](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ad9812ffde0e04f1fda111867fe42aff4cd08a28/?at=deprecated_parser_sdf_1.2_support) which I recently merged it to gazebo-1.3 but not released in ros groovy yet pending more testing.

Following things needs to happen:

  1. add deprecation warning when we see old SDF or old gazebo XML inside of Gazebo Extension blocks in URDF (urge peopel to switch Gazebo Extensions in their URDF to use the new SDF).
  1. start building ros's gazebo package with the official gazebo release branch.
  1. Once that's working, we can in theory update ros gazebo package to use system install of gazebo from our apt-repo?
